languages.text: The wearer’s pet that is adjacent to them can’t fail tests in battle.

traits.locale_text: The wearer’s pet that is adjacent to them can’t fail tests in battle.

languages.text: While the wearer's familiar is adjacent to them, it successfully passes any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} in combat.
languages.original_text: Если фамильяр персонажа находится на соседней с ним клетке, этот фамильяр всегда успешно выполняет любые {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} в бою.

traits.locale_text: While the wearer's familiar is adjacent to them, it successfully passes any tests in combat.

languages.text: Giyen kişinin iyesi, onun bitişiğindeyse çatışmadaki her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testten{/g} başarıyla geçer.
languages.original_text: While the wearer's familiar is adjacent to them, it successfully passes any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Giyen kişinin iyesi, onun bitişiğindeyse çatışmadaki her türlü testten başarıyla geçer.
Giyen kişinin iyesi, onun bitişiğindeyse çatışmadaki her türlü testten başarıyla geçer.

languages.text: Mientras el familiar del portador esté adyacente a él, superará todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} y tiradas que deba hacer en combate.
languages.original_text: While the wearer's familiar is adjacent to them, it successfully passes any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el familiar del portador esté adyacente a él, superará todas las pruebas y tiradas que deba hacer en combate.

languages.text: 当装备者的使仆与装备者相邻时，该使仆会自动通过战斗中的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}。
languages.original_text: While the wearer's familiar is adjacent to them, it successfully passes any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者的使仆与装备者相邻时，该使仆会自动通过战斗中的所有检定。

languages.text: Befindet sich der Vertraute des Trägers angrenzend, besteht er sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} im Kampf erfolgreich.
languages.original_text: While the wearer's familiar is adjacent to them, it successfully passes any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Befindet sich der Vertraute des Trägers angrenzend, besteht er sämtliche Proben im Kampf erfolgreich.

languages.text: Tant que le familier du porteur lui est adjacent, il réussit tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} en combat.
languages.original_text: While the wearer's familiar is adjacent to them, it successfully passes any {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} in combat.

traits.locale_text: Tant que le familier du porteur lui est adjacent, il réussit tous les tests en combat.

languages.text: 使用者の味方が隣接している場合、戦闘時のいかなる{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}も成功する。

traits.locale_text: 使用者の味方が隣接している場合、戦闘時のいかなる判定も成功する。

languages.text: Если фамильяр персонажа находится на соседней с ним клетке, этот фамильяр всегда успешно выполняет любые {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} в бою.
